Project Dependency Graph

Dependency Tree

  • com.github.wolf480pl:jline-log4j2-appender:jar:1.0.0-SNAPSHOT
    JLine Console Log4j2 Appender

    Description: A log4j2 console appender that interoperates properly with JLine ConsoleReader to prevent inserting log messages between command prompt and uesr's input.

    URL: http://github.com/Wolf480pl/jline-log4j2-appender

    Project License: MIT License

    • org.apache.logging.log4j:log4j-core:jar:2.0.1 (compile)

      URL: http://logging.apache.org/log4j/2.x/log4j-core/

      Project License: The Apache Software License, Version 2.0

      • org.apache.logging.log4j:log4j-api:jar:2.0.1 (compile)

        Description: The Log4j API

        URL: http://logging.apache.org/log4j/2.x/log4j-api/

        Project License: The Apache Software License, Version 2.0

    • jline:jline:jar:2.11 (compile)
      JLine

      Description: Sonatype helps open source projects to set up Maven repositories on https://oss.sonatype.org/

      URL: http://nexus.sonatype.org/oss-repository-hosting.html/jline

      Project License: The BSD License
